Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 2 Cūḷantaraduka » 2.6 Lokiyaduka » 2.6.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.6.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 2.6.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Indriya
Cūḷantaraduka
Lokiyaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Indriya
164.
920Lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo (paṭisandhi kātabbā); cakkhundriyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa…pe…  kāyindriyaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa indriyapaccayena paccayo. Rūpajīvitindriyaṃ—  kaṭattārūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
921Lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
<< Āhāraup Jhānādi >>
